name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-fluentui-theme-variant
title: Fluent UI Theme Variant
shortDescription: An example of how to apply a custom theme or a variation of the current SharePoint theme directly to the web part
longDescription: This web part provides an example of how to apply a custom theme or a variation of the current SharePoint theme directly to the web part.
In this way it is possible to implement the same mechanism that is currently implemented by default by the SharePoint page sections

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
